articles.title: The Supreme Court seems poised to give Second Amendment activists a huge gift
articles.description: The Supreme Court listened to arguments in a Second Amendment rights case related to a New York law that prohibits most people from carrying concealed handguns.
articles.content:
Everybody got a pistol. Everybody got a .45. And the philosophy seems to be at least as near as I can see When the other folks give up theirs, Ill give up mine.
